article_title: Trust Wallet Reaches 200 Million Downloads Milestone
summary: Trust Wallet, a leading self-custody Web3 wallet, has reached a monumental milestone of 200 million total downloads. This accomplishment solidifies its status as the top crypto wallet globally. Trust Wallet has evolved into a versatile platform supporting over 10 million assets across 100+ blockchains, offering various functionalities like buying, swapping, staking, and exploring the decentralized web. The CEO emphasized the continued mission of empowering users and highlighted plans for further advancements. Trust Wallet's success is attributed to its user-centric focus on experience, community, trust, and security. The wallet aims to bridge the gap between Web2 simplicity and Web3 autonomy, making decentralized finance and digital ownership more intuitive and secure for millions of users.
